title: Olive Sauce
introduction: Olive Sauce, or Salsa di Olive, is a versatile and delightful accompaniment that can elevate the flavor of grilled meats or serve as a delectable dip for bread or focaccia. Its blend of robust black olive paste, aromatic garlic, and fresh rosemary, all brought together with rich extra-virgin olive oil and tangy balsamic vinegar, makes it a splendid choice for both casual and gourmet uses.
ingredients: 1 garlic clove, peeled and flattened with the side of a knife
instructions: In a medium bowl, whisk together the olive paste, garlic, rosemary, oil, and vinegar.
If the sauce is too thick, thin it with a little more oil.
Let stand at room temperature at least 1 hour.
